title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but in expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias when selecting the dataset
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When trying to select a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias that was set for the columns.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Try to select a dataset that has columns with aliases set.
3. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
